title: Anyone having login issues?
body:
Says its my connection


Edit: Gonna go watch a Movie maybe Sicario or some shitt

replies.body: website to status league of legends isn't even opening :D
Ya it is everyone. Tried everything so far and nothing resolve this. Guess it's on Riots end.
Not even login issues for me, I just can't launch the launcher at all.
Yeah, I just got my 2nd Leaver remake due to that, even though my connections fine.

same prob i was able to get log in once by typing in my password really fast, but once i got in it still gave me the error message. looks like rito is working on it though. i was just able to log in now and haven't gotten the error yet.
I cant get in but a bunch of my friends are playing
I've been having this all day since alpha client asked me to update icons then tried to run cmd prompt but failed and had me restart client
They have to blame someone in that case they blamed our connections..
I am even trying to reinstall and its not working....looks like riot is having internet issues or a ddos attack.
Good ol' rito back at it again
